mapper.select: select a.id, a.sync_config_id AS syncConfigId, a.start_time AS startTime, a.end_time AS endTime, a.input_from AS inputFrom, a.status, a.transaction_group_id AS transactionGroupId, a.server_id AS serverID from cmdb_ci_sync_audit a join cmdb_ci_sync_config b on a.sync_config_id = b.id where b.ci_id = #{value} and a.status = 'doing'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmdb_ci_sync_audit (id, sync_config_id, start_time, input_from, status, transaction_group_id, server_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{syncConfigId}, NOW(3), #{inputFrom}, #{status}, #{transactionGroupId}, #{serverId})
